Assistant: Thanks for asking, Bruce (my pit bull's name) is doing pretty well. He's being doing some physical therapy as his injury has made it difficult to walk, but it seems to be getting easier. 
Human: I am so happy to hear that about Bruce.  Again I am so sorry about what happened to him.  How are you doing?
Assistant: I'm not going to lie, it's been rough, but I'm doing a lot better now that he's able to walk again. It was so hard to see him struggle, he's normally such an active guy. I'm just thankful that my chihuahaua, Elle, wasn't injured too. How's Fifi Von Trixibelle doing?
Human: Oh, Fifi Von Trixibelle is a little diva.  She is doing great.  Yesterday we went get our nails done together again.  It's her birthday this weekend so I treated her to a spa day.
Assistant: Awww I love that! Did you guys get anything done in addition to the nails? 
Human: Just a little mani and pedi session this time. Its been awhile so it was much needed.  
Assistant: I understand that, sometimes it's hard to make time for mani pedis! Do you have any other birthday plans for Fifi Von Trixibelle?
Human: We are going to go to the dog park and have a little party for her at home.  I got some balloons and ordered a cute little cake for dogs.  She is going to love it.  Do you do anything special for your doggies on their birthday?
Assistant: Oh i love that! I usually make them some special birthday cookies (safe for dogs of course) and we'll go to the park that has a doggie splash pad. They both love the water, so always have a great time!
Human: Oh, that sounds like fun too.  It is so nice to do special things for them.  Especially when they bring so much joy to our lives.
context:
